Package browsermonkey.render

Interface Summary
Linkable Provides an interface for linking documents.
 

Class Summary
InvisibleTagRenderer Does not render anything into the document for passed nodes or their children.
LayoutRenderNode Represents a block level element that can contain text and other RenderNodes.
Renderer Renders documents from DocumentNode trees.
RenderNode Provides a base for the nodes used to render the document.
TagRenderer Provides a base for TagRenderers that render TagDocumentNodes into RenderNodes.
TextRenderNode Renders formatted text with word wrap as a self-sizing RenderNode.
TransparentTagRenderer Renders a TagDocumentNode's children into the document in place; the effect of the node itself is transparent.
 

Enum Summary
LayoutRenderNode.WidthBehaviour Determines how the layout node will calculate the maximum width.
